name: Big 6x6 Cargo Race Snow Hills
description:
Enjoy insane trucking experience in absolute best car racing along with increasing difficulty at every level of hill climb racing. Take your precision driving to the next level by crazy truck race on two different monster truck racing mode offroad & snow.

10 challenging truck driving simulator missions for insane rally racing championship.
Unlock dangerous missions and heavy trucks by gaining points.
Test your driving skills by performing crazy stunts and massive jumps.
Realistic off-road desert and snow tracks environment.
Perfect truck physics with smooth accelerator, brake and steering controls.
